get.summary:
> [!NOTE]
> This API is in preview.

Returns a list of SQL databases from the specified workspace.
get.description:
This API supports [pagination](/rest/api/fabric/articles/pagination).

## Permissions

The caller must have a *viewer* workspace role.

## Required Delegated Scopes

Workspace.Read.All or Workspace.ReadWrite.All

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |

## Interface

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: A token for retrieving the next page of results.

default.description:
Common error codes:

* InvalidItemType - Invalid item type.

post.summary:
> [!NOTE]
> This API is in preview.

Creates a SQL database in the specified workspace.
post.description:
This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).

 This API does not support create a SQL database with definition. 

## Permissions

The caller must have a *contributor* workspace role.

## Required Delegated Scopes

 SQLDatabase.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All 

## Limitations 
- To create a SQL database the workspace must be on a supported Fabric capacity. For more information see: [Microsoft Fabric license types](/fabric/enterprise/licenses#microsoft-fabric-license-types).

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |

## Interface

202.description: Request accepted, SQL database provisioning in progress.

Location.description: The URL of the operation status, which can be used to track the operation state.

x-ms-operation-id.description: The operation ID which can be used with long running operations (LRO) APIs to track the operation state and get the result.

Retry-After.description: The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request.

default.description:
Common error codes:

* InvalidItemType - Item type is invalid

* ItemDisplayNameAlreadyInUse - Item display name is already used.

* CorruptedPayload - The provided payload is corrupted.

* WorkspaceItemsLimitExceeded - Workspace item limit exceeded.

get.summary:
> [!NOTE]
> This API is in preview.

Returns properties of the specified SQL database.
get.description:
## Permissions

The caller must have *read* permissions for the SQL database.

## Required Delegated Scopes

 SQLDatabase.Read.All or SQLDatabase.ReadWrite.All or Item.Read.All or Item.ReadWrite.All

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |

## Interface

default.description:
Common error codes:

* ItemNotFound - The requested item was not found.

patch.summary:
> [!NOTE]
> This API is in preview.

Updates the properties of the specified SQL database.
patch.description:
## Permissions

The caller must have *read and write* permissions for the SQL database.

## Required Delegated Scopes

 SQLDatabase.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |

## Interface

default.description:
Common error codes:

* ItemNotFound - The requested item was not found. 

* InvalidRequest - Invalid update request.

delete.summary:
> [!NOTE]
> This API is in preview.

Deletes the specified SQL database.
delete.description:
## Permissions

The caller must have *write* permissions for the SQL database.

## Required Delegated Scopes

 SQLDatabase.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |

## Interface

Common error codes:

* ItemNotFound - The requested item was not found.
